info.description: Manage global sponsorship for homepage widgets

sponsorshipTitles.description: Multiple sponsorship titles that can be displayed

isActive.description: Whether this sponsorship is currently active

sponsoredWidgets.description: Array of widget types that should show this sponsorship. Available widgets: radio, weather, news, events, deals, business, social, traffic, youtube, photos, quick-links, trending, breaking-news, live-events, currency-converter, google-reviews, flight-tracker, restaurant, movie, travel. Example: ["radio", "weather", "news"]

defaultColor.description: Default color for sponsorship text when individual titles don't specify colors

animationSpeed.description: Speed of marquee animation for multiple titles

sponsorWebsite.description: Website URL of the sponsoring brand
